absolve.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to say publicly that someone is not guilty or responsible for something
absolve.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He cannot be absolved of all responsibility for the accident.
absolve.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if someone is absolved by the Christian Church or a priest for something they have done wrong, they are formally forgiven
absolve.translation[0].definitions[1].no: Absolve is often passive in this meaning
